snippet: The Republican candidates for president have gathered at St. Anselm's College for the first of two back-to-back debates that could serve as a televised confrontation of Mitt Romney, who has a large lead in the polls here.
abstract: The Republican candidates for president have gathered at St. Anselm's College for the first of two back-to-back debates that could serve as a televised confrontation of Mitt Romney, who has a large lead in the polls here.
